dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1469 IH: To prohibit a mask mandate to prevent the spread of COVID–19 on a military installation in the United States.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Norman (for himself, Mr. Bishop of North Carolina, Mr. Duncan, Mr. Good of Virginia, Ms. Greene of Georgia, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, and Mr. Steube) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To prohibit a mask mandate to prevent the spread of COVID–19 on a military installation in the United States.

section.header: Prohibition of mask mandate to prevent the spread of COVID–19 on a military installation in the United States
section.text: The Secretary of Defense may not require that an individual wear a mask, in order to prevent the spread of COVID–19, on a military installation inside the United States.
